00030 #include <lustre/lustre_idl.h>
00031 #include <obd.h>
00032 #include <lustre_linkea.h>
00033 
00034 int linkea_data_new(struct linkea_data *ldata, struct lu_buf *buf)
00035 {
00036         ldata->ld_buf = lu_buf_check_and_alloc(buf, PAGE_CACHE_SIZE);
00037         if (ldata->ld_buf->lb_buf == NULL)
00038                 return -ENOMEM;
00039         ldata->ld_leh = ldata->ld_buf->lb_buf;
00040         ldata->ld_leh->leh_magic = LINK_EA_MAGIC;
00041         ldata->ld_leh->leh_len = sizeof(struct link_ea_header);
00042         ldata->ld_leh->leh_reccount = 0;
00043         return 0;
00044 }
00045 EXPORT_SYMBOL(linkea_data_new);
00046 
00047 int linkea_init(struct linkea_data *ldata)
00048 {
00049         struct link_ea_header *leh;
00050 
00051         LASSERT(ldata->ld_buf != NULL);
00052         leh = ldata->ld_buf->lb_buf;
00053         if (leh->leh_magic == __swab32(LINK_EA_MAGIC)) {
00054                 leh->leh_magic = LINK_EA_MAGIC;
00055                 leh->leh_reccount = __swab32(leh->leh_reccount);
00056                 leh->leh_len = __swab64(leh->leh_len);
00057                 /* entries are swabbed by linkea_entry_unpack */
00058         }
00059         if (leh->leh_magic != LINK_EA_MAGIC)
00060                 return -EINVAL;
00061         if (leh->leh_reccount == 0)
00062                 return -ENODATA;
00063 
00064         ldata->ld_leh = leh;
00065         return 0;
00066 }
00067 EXPORT_SYMBOL(linkea_init);
00068 
00075 int linkea_entry_pack(struct link_ea_entry *lee, const struct lu_name *lname,
00076                       const struct lu_fid *pfid)
00077 {
00078         struct lu_fid   tmpfid;
00079         int             reclen;
00080 
00081         tmpfid = *pfid;
00082         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_MUL_REF))
00083                 tmpfid.f_oid--;
00084         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_LINKEA_CRASH))
00085                 tmpfid.f_ver = ~0;
00086         fid_cpu_to_be(&tmpfid, &tmpfid);
00087         memcpy(&lee->lee_parent_fid, &tmpfid, sizeof(tmpfid));
00088         memcpy(lee->lee_name, lname->ln_name, lname->ln_namelen);
00089         reclen = sizeof(struct link_ea_entry) + lname->ln_namelen;
00090 
00091         lee->lee_reclen[0] = (reclen >> 8) & 0xff;
00092         lee->lee_reclen[1] = reclen & 0xff;
00093         return reclen;
00094 }
00095 EXPORT_SYMBOL(linkea_entry_pack);
00096 
00097 void linkea_entry_unpack(const struct link_ea_entry *lee, int *reclen,
00098                          struct lu_name *lname, struct lu_fid *pfid)
00099 {
00100         *reclen = (lee->lee_reclen[0] << 8) | lee->lee_reclen[1];
00101         memcpy(pfid, &lee->lee_parent_fid, sizeof(*pfid));
00102         fid_be_to_cpu(pfid, pfid);
00103         if (lname != NULL) {
00104                 lname->ln_name = lee->lee_name;
00105                 lname->ln_namelen = *reclen - sizeof(struct link_ea_entry);
00106         }
00107 }
00108 EXPORT_SYMBOL(linkea_entry_unpack);
00109 
00113 int linkea_add_buf(struct linkea_data *ldata, const struct lu_name *lname,
00114                    const struct lu_fid *pfid)
00115 {
00116         LASSERT(ldata->ld_leh != NULL);
00117 
00118         if (lname == NULL || pfid == NULL)
00119                 return -EINVAL;
00120 
00121         ldata->ld_reclen = lname->ln_namelen + sizeof(struct link_ea_entry);
00122         if (ldata->ld_leh->leh_len + ldata->ld_reclen >
00123             ldata->ld_buf->lb_len) {
00124                 if (lu_buf_check_and_grow(ldata->ld_buf,
00125                                           ldata->ld_leh->leh_len +
00126                                           ldata->ld_reclen) < 0)
00127                         return -ENOMEM;
00128         }
00129 
00130         ldata->ld_leh = ldata->ld_buf->lb_buf;
00131         ldata->ld_lee = ldata->ld_buf->lb_buf + ldata->ld_leh->leh_len;
00132         ldata->ld_reclen = linkea_entry_pack(ldata->ld_lee, lname, pfid);
00133         ldata->ld_leh->leh_len += ldata->ld_reclen;
00134         ldata->ld_leh->leh_reccount++;
00135         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "New link_ea name '%.*s' is added\n",
00136                lname->ln_namelen, lname->ln_name);
00137         return 0;
00138 }
00139 EXPORT_SYMBOL(linkea_add_buf);
00140 
00142 void linkea_del_buf(struct linkea_data *ldata, const struct lu_name *lname)
00143 {
00144         LASSERT(ldata->ld_leh != NULL && ldata->ld_lee != NULL);
00145 
00146         ldata->ld_leh->leh_reccount--;
00147         ldata->ld_leh->leh_len -= ldata->ld_reclen;
00148         memmove(ldata->ld_lee, (char *)ldata->ld_lee + ldata->ld_reclen,
00149                 (char *)ldata->ld_leh + ldata->ld_leh->leh_len -
00150                 (char *)ldata->ld_lee);
00151         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "Old link_ea name '%.*s' is removed\n",
00152                lname->ln_namelen, lname->ln_name);
00153 
00154         if ((char *)ldata->ld_lee >= ((char *)ldata->ld_leh +
00155                                       ldata->ld_leh->leh_len))
00156                 ldata->ld_lee = NULL;
00157 }
00158 EXPORT_SYMBOL(linkea_del_buf);
00159 
00171 int linkea_links_find(struct linkea_data *ldata, const struct lu_name *lname,
00172                       const struct lu_fid  *pfid)
00173 {
00174         struct lu_name tmpname;
00175         struct lu_fid  tmpfid;
00176         int count;
00177 
00178         LASSERT(ldata->ld_leh != NULL);
00179 
00180         /* link #0 */
00181         ldata->ld_lee = (struct link_ea_entry *)(ldata->ld_leh + 1);
00182 
00183         for (count = 0; count < ldata->ld_leh->leh_reccount; count++) {
00184                 linkea_entry_unpack(ldata->ld_lee, &ldata->ld_reclen,
00185                                     &tmpname, &tmpfid);
00186                 if (tmpname.ln_namelen == lname->ln_namelen &&
00187                     lu_fid_eq(&tmpfid, pfid) &&
00188                     (strncmp(tmpname.ln_name, lname->ln_name,
00189                              tmpname.ln_namelen) == 0))
00190                         break;
00191                 ldata->ld_lee = (struct link_ea_entry *)((char *)ldata->ld_lee +
00192                                                          ldata->ld_reclen);
00193         }
00194 
00195         if (count == ldata->ld_leh->leh_reccount) {
00196                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "Old link_ea name '%.*s' not found\n",
00197                        lname->ln_namelen, lname->ln_name);
00198                 ldata->ld_lee = NULL;
00199                 ldata->ld_reclen = 0;
00200                 return -ENOENT;
00201         }
00202         return 0;
00203 }
00204 EXPORT_SYMBOL(linkea_links_find);
